name: Saint of Links
description:
As an angel, it is your duty, to banish the unholy of this world!

Make Combos and multiply your stats by linking them to each other!

------- Noticed bugs: 

The DmgMultiplyer Link doesn't cost anything

------- Mistakes:

I sadly didn't include  a way to restart the battle without losing.

I didn't realize that you can just multiply anything with the Player HP and you'll be op instantly.

------- Credits:

Font: https://www.1001fonts.com/mini-pixel-7-font.html

Sounds: sfxr
